name: Bannerbear
natural_language_description: 这是 Bannerbear 节点。主要用于: Consume Bannerbear API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: image

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many templates

templateId.name: templateId
templateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Template ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the template | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: metadata (值: None) - Metadata that you need to store e.g. ID of a record in your DB

waitForImage (值: None) - Whether to wait for the image to be proccesed before returning. If after three tries the images is not ready, an error will be thrown. Number of tries can be increased by setting "Wait Max Tries".
waitForImageMaxTries (值: None) - How often it should check if the image is available before it fails
webhookUrl (值: None) - A URL to POST the Image object to upon rendering completed

modificationsUi.name: modificationsUi
modificationsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Modifications | 默认值: {}

imageId.name: imageId
imageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Image ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the image | (必填项)
